content: the simple socks are knit using magic loop and build on foundational skills the simple socks were the second design of the textured collection by vander stitches focusing on creating a customizable and cozy wardrobe the pattern was designed for christmas morning to wear with my family * toe up knit sock * second page includes graphic of sock design * uses charts and written pattern * customizable height and length but circumference is not * circumference = 7 5 inches for 60 stitches * uses 1 skein of your favorite sock yarn self stripping is recommended to add some flair to your pattern happy stitching
